◆ PerceptFilterThreshold()

void image_processing::PerceptFilterThreshold ( std::string  target_color,
cv::Mat &  img_hsv,
cv::Mat &  img_threshold 
)

Filters HSV image according to target_color defined in header (hsv_threshold_dict). creates binary mask where pixels within the target_color range are white and black otherwise.

Parameters
target_colorString to specify which color to load from hsv_threshold_dict defined in header
img_hsvcolor image in hsv color space
img_thresholdoutput image after filtering
